text: RISING STAR : Margot Robbie shot to stardom in The Wolf Of Wall Street [ PH ] Twelve months ago nobody had heard of Margot Robbie. But all that changed when she went toe to toe with Leonardo di Caprio, and flaunted her incredible curves, in last year's smash hit The Wolf Of Wall Street. Before she shot to stardom, the Aussie actress had done the obligatory stint on Neighbours and then headed to Hollywood, quickly landing a role in the cancelled TV drama Pan Am and a supporting part in last year ’ s Richard Curtis rom - com, About Time. But Robbie almost turned down her star - making role in The Wolf Of Wall Street over her concerns about all the nudity. “ For a while, I thought, ‘ Maybe
